title: Sampath Bank ranked LMD's 'Most Respected Entities in Sri Lanka'
snippet: Sampath Bank has been ranked 5th in LMD's Most Respected Entities in Sri Lanka 2021 rankings based on a survey commissioned and conceptualized by LMD and conducted by Nielsen.The rankings are based on ratings received from a sample of 800 respondents - managers and above - from listed companies on a set of 12 different attributes.

title: Sri Lanka welcomes tourists again
snippet: Sri Lanka has welcomed 2,439 tourists in July 2021, up from zero a year earlier, taking the total so far in 2021 to 19,337, under COVID-19 controls known as 'bio-bubble' data from the state tourism promotion bureau shows.

title: Solar-powered fences at Rani Reserve Forest keeping elephants away
snippet: The solar-powered hanging fence has been installed on the fringe of Rani Reserve Forest to prevent wild elephants from straying into human habitations and paddy fields. The two km-long solar-powered fences from Nalapara to Belguri and from Mahindri to Silkhuta were built for Rs 8 lakh under SoPD put up at Rani forest area under the Rani forest range in July 2020 has turned out to be an innovative solution to mitigate human-wildlife conflict.
